start.title: Click to start
start.description: The shape will drop whenever you blink

uploading.title: Uploading image...
uploading.description: Please wait a few moments while uploading image.

page.eyeEcho-theme-picker-page-description-co: Eye Echo used your unique eye movements, like blinking and scanning, to manipulate shapes and colors on your screen in real-time. After 30 seconds, your masterpiece will be ready! Before getting started, pick a color theme for your artwork below:
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-1-title: WHILE YOU WERE PLAYING, WE'VE BEEN WORKING
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-1-sub-1: Expanation how the user's number of blinks compares to that of their peers.
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-1-sub-2: Interesting statistic that links age to average number of blinks per day.
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-1-sub-3: Interesting fact about how their personalized collage was created.
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-2-sub-1: Helpful tip here to educate user about premature undereye aging
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-2-sub-2: Helpful tip here to educate user about premature undereye aging
page.eyeEcho-result-info-page-desc-2-sub-3: Helpful tip here to educate user about premature undereye aging
page.eyeEcho-shop-page-desc-content: We make over 100, 000 eye movements per day. The skin around our eyes is the most delicate, and isn't equipped to withstand this perpetual motion. Give them a boost with our NEW Biolumin - C Eye Serum
page.eyeEcho-shop-page-desc-overlay-text: This formula works with skin's natural biology to address fine lines and wrinkles at their source rather than simply concealing them.
